CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ETA_for_test__c)),ETA_for_test__c,
IF(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Mystery Order") ,ETA_for_test__c,
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Last Chance"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "CSAT"), ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Late Response Rate"), ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Policy violation")) ), TODAY() + 28 - (TODAY() - Has_begun_on__c),
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Last Chance"), ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Defective Rate")), Has_entered_Last_chance_on__c + 42,
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Last Chance"),ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Charter breaches") ), Has_entered_Last_chance_on__c + 35,
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Last Chance"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Payment issue"),ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Payment issue") ) ), Has_entered_Last_chance_on__c + 14,
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Last Chance"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Defective Rate")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Charter breaches")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Policy violation")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Payment issue")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Payment issue"))), Has_entered_Last_chance_on__c + 28,
IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Monitoring Period"), ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Defective Rate")), Has_begun_on__c + 42,
IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Monitoring Period"),ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Charter breaches" )), Has_begun_on__c + 35,
IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Monitoring Period"),OR(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Payment issue"),ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Payment issue"))), Has_begun_on__c + 14,
IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Monitoring Period"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Defective Rate")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Charter breaches")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Buyback - Payment issue")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Payment issue"))), Has_begun_on__c + 28,
IF( AND ( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Not compliant"),ISPICKVAL(Issue_KPI__c, "Invoice Compliance Audit")), Has_begun_on__c + 30,
IF( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Refused"), Has_been_refused_on__c,
IF( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Saved"), Has_been_saved_on__c, Has_failed_on__c ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ))))))
CustomField.label: ETA
